block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: continuously reading from DHT22 and display the readings
DHT22 extract and display the readings from DHT22
2 2 values returned 1st value is temperature in Celcius 2nd value is humidity in Percentage
DHT22 DHT22 Temperature and Humidity Sensor
